GSD.description:
nvmet-tcp: add bounds check on Transfer Tag

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 752593d04637ebdc87fd29cba81897f21ae053f0. For more details please see the references link.
